name: TwinBee Taisen Puzzle-Dama
storyline:
One day, a telepathic message from outer space was sent to the TwinBee Team on Donburi Island.

"I'm Princess Melora, the 'Super Bell' is approaching Donburi Island..." The Super Bell was an item that came to fulfill the people's wishes once every 300 years. The TwinBee Team kept their wishes in their hearts and headed to find the Super Bell. However, only one wish could be fulfilled.

TwinBee, WinBee, Light, Pastel, Madoka, Miss Apple and even Dr. Warumon participated in the "Puzzle Game" to decide which wish would be fulfilled by the Super Bell...!
summary: TwinBee Taisen Puzzle-Dama is a competitive action-puzzle game for the PlayStation released only in Japan. It is the third installment in the Taisen Puzzle-Dama series of puzzle video games and features the characters and settings of Konami's long-running TwinBee series of shoot 'em up games.
